Beyonce - 6 Colors

Palette copied from beyonce R package by DL Miller, based on the collection shown at http://beyoncepalettes.tumblr.com/. The Beyonce palettes are labeled based on number of colors in the palette, then sorted lexographically, a deviation from the ordering in the R package.
